element.definition: The definition of variant here originates from Sequence ontology ([variant_of](http://www.sequenceontology.org/browser/current_svn/term/variant_of)). This element can represent amino acid or nucleic sequence change(including insertion,deletion,SNP,etc.)  It can represent some complex mutation or segment variation with the assist of CIGAR string.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
